original: @5b # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @5b # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i pra dzny'a a'a lo ke kri tya sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i pra dzny'a a'a lo ke kri tya sto tra n'a ma /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i bstod ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i bstod ba zhes bya ba /

original: dpal rdo rje pag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje pag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum gar stabs bzhengs pa ni //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum gar stabs bzhengs pa ni //

original: gzi ldan blta bas mi ngoms yid 'phrog ma //
analyzed: gzi ldan blta bas mi ngoms yid 'phrog ma //

original: 'dzum ldan zur gzigs sgeg mo'i zhabs pad la //
analyzed: 'dzum ldan zur gzigs sgeg mo'i zhabs pad la //
translated: Smiling, glancing sideways, with lotus feet,

original: bdag blo gus pas spyi bos gus phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: bdag blo gus pas spyi bos gus phyag 'tshal //
translated: I bow my head in devoted homage with my mind full of respect.

original: skyabs sems tshad med bzhi bsgoms rang snying gar //
analyzed: skyabs sems tshad med bzhi bsgoms rang snying gar //
translated: Taking refuge, arousing the mind of awakening, meditating on the four immeasurables, in my heart

original: aom gyur nyi steng hr'i: dkar 'od 'phros pas /
analyzed: aom gyur nyi steng hr'i: dkar 'od 'phros pas /
translated: Is om, which becomes a white hrƒ´·∏• radiating light rays,

original: khyod sogs rgyal ba sras bcas sgeg mo'i tshogs //
analyzed: khyod sogs rgyal ba sras bcas sgeg mo'i tshogs //
translated: Inviting the assembly of goddesses, such as you, the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: phyag 'tshal mchod sogs gar byed la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal mchod sogs gar byed la phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the dance of prostration, offering, and so forth.

original: sngags kyis stong par rab sbyangs pam yig las //
analyzed: sngags kyis stong par rab sbyangs pam yig las //
translated: Purified by the mantra, emptiness, from the syllable pam

original: padma'i steng du aam gyur nyi ma'i steng //
analyzed: padma'i steng du aam gyur nyi ma'i steng //
translated: On a lotus, am becomes a sun,

original: h'um gyur nyi dkyil hr'i: dkar rdo rjes mtshan //üîΩyongs gyur dpa' mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: h'um gyur nyi dkyil hr'i: dkar rdo rjes mtshan // yongs gyur dpa' mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The syllable h≈´·πÉ becomes a sun disc, upon which is a white hri·∏•.üîΩFrom that arises a vajra marked with a hri·∏•, which becomes the body of Vƒ´rƒÅ, to whom I pay homage.

original: khyod sku gcer bu zhal gcig mche ba gtsigs //
analyzed: khyod sku gcer bu zhal gcig mche ba gtsigs //
translated: Your body is naked, with one face and bared fangs,

original: cung zad khros pa'i smin g-yo spyan gsum dmar //
analyzed: cung zad khros pa'i smin g-yo spyan gsum dmar //
translated: slightly wrathful, with eyebrows and three eyes red,

original: khrag 'dzag mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal gyis //
analyzed: khrag 'dzag mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal gyis //

original: sku brgyan 'jigs med sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sku brgyan 'jigs med sku la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: chu shel ltar gsal dung gi mdog 'dra zhing //
analyzed: chu shel ltar gsal dung gi mdog 'dra zhing //

original: sna tshogs 'khor lo rgyan cha lnga yis brgyan //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'khor lo rgyan cha lnga yis brgyan //
translated: adorned with the five bone ornaments and a variegated wheel,

original: yid 'ong sil sil dar dpyangs 'phur lding gis //
analyzed: yid 'ong sil sil dar dpyangs 'phur lding gis //
translated: charming, tinkling, swaying with the fluttering silk ribbons,

original: rab dgyes bzhad ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rab dgyes bzhad ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the speech of Rati≈õrƒ´.

original: phyag gnyis g-yas pa rdo rjes dbugs bral la //
analyzed: phyag gnyis g-yas pa rdo rjes dbugs bral la //
translated: Your two hands, the right one holding a vajra,üîΩthrust upward, the left one holding a kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga at the elbow,

original: bsnun 'phyar g-yon pa gru mor kha tv'am dang // bdud bzhi'i thod khrag thugs kar bsnams nas gsol //
analyzed: bsnun 'phyar g-yon pa gru mor kha tv'am dang // bdud bzhi'i thod khrag thugs kar bsnams nas gsol //
translated: and drinking blood from the skull of the four mƒÅras at your heart,

original: 'jigs rung sgrogs pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jigs rung sgrogs pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to your terrifyingly roaring speech.

original: sna tshogs padma'i steng na nyi ma la //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i steng na nyi ma la //
translated: On a multicolored lotus, on a sun,

original: skyes bu dbugs bral mgo bo g-yas bstan steng //
analyzed: skyes bu dbugs bral mgo bo g-yas bstan steng //
translated: a human corpse, the head facing right,

original: zhabs gnyis g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum gar stabs bzhugs //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum gar stabs bzhugs //
translated: with two legs, right extended, left drawn in, dancing pose.

original: rngam 'jigs drag sgrogs gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rngam 'jigs drag sgrogs gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the speech of fierce, terrifying, and wrathful roaring!

original: dbu skra bung ba @6a * //
analyzed: dbu skra bung ba @6a * //
translated: Hair black as a bee,

original: ltar gnag me tog thod //
analyzed: ltar gnag me tog thod //
translated: flower skull,

original: g-yas g-yon rgyab 'phyang phyed bcings thor tshugs na //
analyzed: g-yas g-yon rgyab 'phyang phyed bcings thor tshugs na //
translated: hanging left and right, half-bound topknot,

original: sems can kun la brtse ba'i mi bskyod 'dzin //
analyzed: sems can kun la brtse ba'i mi bskyod 'dzin //
translated: holding Ak·π£obhya out of love for all beings.

original: snying rjes sngags 'chang thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: snying rjes sngags 'chang thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the mind of the mantra holder with compassion!

original: ye shes lnga mtshon gangs ri ltar dkar ba'i //
analyzed: ye shes lnga mtshon gangs ri ltar dkar ba'i //
translated: White as a snow mountain, symbolizing the five wisdoms,

original: thod skam lnga yis khyod kyi dbu la brgyan //
analyzed: thod skam lnga yis khyod kyi dbu la brgyan //
translated: your head is adorned with five dry skulls.

original: rngam pa'i tshul gyis bdud bzhi 'dul la brtson //
analyzed: rngam pa'i tshul gyis bdud bzhi 'dul la brtson //
translated: In a fierce manner, you strive to subdue the four mƒÅras.

original: bgegs 'dul rngam ma'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bgegs 'dul rngam ma'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the mind of the fierce one who subdues obstacles!

original: zla ba'i 'od zer bcu drug lon pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od zer bcu drug lon pa'i gzugs //
translated: The form of a sixteen-year-old with the light of the moon,

original: lang tsho rab rgyas sgeg mo'i sprul pa yis //
analyzed: lang tsho rab rgyas sgeg mo'i sprul pa yis //
translated: an emanation of a youthful, flirtatious woman,

original: lha mo sna tshogs kun nas spro bsdu bas //
analyzed: lha mo sna tshogs kun nas spro bsdu bas //
translated: You emanate and gather in all the goddesses,

original: bdag mchod dgyes bzhi'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bdag mchod dgyes bzhi'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are pleased by the offering of the self.

original: mi shes blo yi rab rib bsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mi shes blo yi rab rib bsal ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to clear away the cataracts of the ignorant mind,

original: lte bar chu skyes ge sar g-yo ba'i dbus //
analyzed: lte bar chu skyes ge sar g-yo ba'i dbus //
translated: In the center of the moving pistil cup of the navel lotus,

original: tsha zer rgyal po 'od zer 'bar ba'i steng //
analyzed: tsha zer rgyal po 'od zer 'bar ba'i steng //
translated: Upon the blazing light rays of the king of hot rays,

original: hr'im bzhugs 'od dkar 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: hr'im bzhugs 'od dkar 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: I pay homage to the one who resides in the form of hri·πÉ, radiating white light.

original: / hr'i: dkar dh'u t'i nas bzhugs zhal nas 'thon //
analyzed: / hr'i: dkar dh'u t'i nas bzhugs zhal nas 'thon //
translated: Hri·πÉ, residing in the white dh≈´tƒ´, emerging from the mouth,üîΩLight rays radiate to the ten directions, gathering the qualities of the buddhas,

original: 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros nas sangs rgyas dang // mkhas pa'i yon tan bstan bcos sgyu rtsal sogs //
analyzed: 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros nas sangs rgyas dang // mkhas pa'i yon tan bstan bcos sgyu rtsal sogs //
translated: The qualities of the learned, treatises, arts, and so on,

original: 'od kyis lte bar sdud la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'od kyis lte bar sdud la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one who gathers the light at the navel.

original: de dag myur bar mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin //
analyzed: de dag myur bar mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin //
translated: Those [qualities] quickly circle like a fire wheel,

original: lte ba nas zhugs zhal nas rab 'khor zhing //
analyzed: lte ba nas zhugs zhal nas rab 'khor zhing //
translated: Entering from the navel and emerging from the mouth,

original: 'od zer yon tan dang bcas gter bsdus nas //
analyzed: 'od zer yon tan dang bcas gter bsdus nas //
translated: Gathering the light and qualities,

original: rab 'khor shes rab stsol la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rab 'khor shes rab stsol la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one who bestows wisdom.

original: khyod kyi blo gros rta bdun 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: khyod kyi blo gros rta bdun 'od zer gyis //
translated: Your mind is the seven horses and light rays,

original: gdul bya'i blo yi pad tshal rgyas byed cing //
analyzed: gdul bya'i blo yi pad tshal rgyas byed cing //
translated: You cause the lotus garden of the minds of disciples to bloom,

original: blo ngan blo yi mun pa sel mdzad pa //
analyzed: blo ngan blo yi mun pa sel mdzad pa //
translated: And clear away the darkness of the minds of the wicked.

original: phrin las 'od tshogs 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phrin las 'od tshogs 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, whose light rays of activity spread out.

original: khyod kyi thabs mkhas thugs rje'i rgya mtsho las //
analyzed: khyod kyi thabs mkhas thugs rje'i rgya mtsho las //
translated: From the ocean of your skillful means and compassion,üîΩArise the lotus-born siddhis, such as fearlessness,

original: 'jigs 'joms dbang sdud dug sel shes rab sogs //
analyzed: 'jigs 'joms dbang sdud dug sel shes rab sogs //
translated: Subjugation, poison-neutralizing wisdom, and so forth,

original: pad 'khrungs dngos grub sbrang rtsis gus ldan gyi //
analyzed: pad 'khrungs dngos grub sbrang rtsis gus ldan gyi //
translated: Which satisfy the devoted bees with the honey of siddhis.

original: bung ba tshim par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bung ba tshim par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you.

original: khyod kyi yon tan mtha' yas sangs rgyas mkhyen //
analyzed: khyod kyi yon tan mtha' yas sangs rgyas mkhyen //
translated: The buddhas know your infinite qualities,üîΩWhich cannot be known by someone like me,

original: bdag 'dras shes min sa bcu'i sems dpas kyang //
analyzed: bdag 'dras shes min sa bcu'i sems dpas kyang //
translated: And even the bodhisattvas on the tenth bhumi

original: bskal brgyar brjod kyang brjod par ga la nus //
analyzed: bskal brgyar brjod kyang brjod par ga la nus //
translated: Could not express them in a hundred eons.

original: dang ga med yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dang ga med yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, who possess the inconceivable qualities.

original: dngos su bshams dang blo yis sprul pa @6b yi ;
analyzed: dngos su bshams dang blo yis sprul pa @6b yi ;
translated: Whatever offerings I have arranged here in actuality and emanated mentally,üîΩSuch as water for drinking and bathing, flowers, incense, lamps,

original: / yon chab me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri chab zhal zas rol mo ci mchis rnams //
analyzed: / yon chab me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri chab zhal zas rol mo ci mchis rnams //
translated: Perfume, food, and music,

original: blo yis blangs nas gus pa'i yid kyis mchod //
analyzed: blo yis blangs nas gus pa'i yid kyis mchod //
translated: I mentally offer with a devoted mind.

original: dug gsum dbang gis sgo gsum mi dge'i las //
analyzed: dug gsum dbang gis sgo gsum mi dge'i las //
translated: Whatever non-virtuous actions I have done with my three doors

original: gang bgyis ma lus rmongs pa'i yid kyis bshags //
analyzed: gang bgyis ma lus rmongs pa'i yid kyis bshags //
translated: under the influence of the three poisons, I confess all of them with a remorseful mind.

original: rang gzhan dge ba ji snyed bgyis kun la //
analyzed: rang gzhan dge ba ji snyed bgyis kun la //
translated: Whatever virtues I and others have done,

original: bdag dang dga' ba'i blo yis rjes yi rang //
analyzed: bdag dang dga' ba'i blo yis rjes yi rang //
translated: I rejoice in them all with a joyful mind.

original: bla med theg mchog ston pa'i gsung rab la //
analyzed: bla med theg mchog ston pa'i gsung rab la //
translated: In the scriptures that teach the unsurpassed supreme vehicle,

original: dri med chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
analyzed: dri med chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
translated: I request you to turn the stainless wheel of Dharma.

original: srid pa'i rgya mtsho ji srid ma bskams par //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtsho ji srid ma bskams par //
translated: For as long as the ocean of existence is not dried up,

original: de srid yun du brtse bas bzhugs su gsol //
analyzed: de srid yun du brtse bas bzhugs su gsol //
translated: I request you to remain for that long out of loving kindness.üîΩBy that virtue of respectfully praising you, O Vajravarahi,

original: bdag gis khyod kyi yon tan phyogs cha tsam //üîΩgus pa'i yid kyis bstod pa'i dge ba des //
analyzed: bdag gis khyod kyi yon tan phyogs cha tsam // gus pa'i yid kyis bstod pa'i dge ba des //
translated: even just a fraction of your qualities,

original: bdag ni 'gro ba'i ma rig mun sel zhing //
analyzed: bdag ni 'gro ba'i ma rig mun sel zhing //
translated: may I dispel the darkness of ignorance of beingsüîΩand attain the state of Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob par shog / dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i bstod pa slob dpon kong ka na p'a das mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob par shog / dpal rdo rje phag mo shes rab gsal byed ma'i bstod pa slob dpon kong ka na p'a das mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise of the glorious Vajravarahi, Illuminator of Wisdom, composed by Master Kongkanadvi.

original: // / pandi ta ratna rakshi ta dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta ratna rakshi ta dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The pandita Ratnarakshita and the translator, the monk Drup-pa Pal-sangpo, translated it.
